item.title: Quick Start
item.description: 1. Get the appKey and appSecret # You need to contact us to obtain an API key. Please contact us by visiting SpeechEvalPro website clicking Start free trial / Buy now button and fill in a form. We’ll get in touch with you in 1 business day. 2. Git clone the samples to your local # git clone https://github.com/KevinKaul/speechevalpro-api-samples.git 3. Identify your needs # question type (mode) : phoneme、word、sentence、chapter
